Glendale.Hulett C. Merritt mansion:
The Hulett C. Merritt mansion, also called the "Villa Merritt Ollivier", is a Mediterranean Revival style historical residence located in Pasadena, California.
Hulett C. Merritt's fortune was made largely in the railway and steel industries.
It was featured in the opening scenes of The Millionaire, a popular TV series of the 1950s.
